query:
query getZoneDataQuery($roomType: String!, $zoneId: String!, $categoryId: String!, $subCategoryId: String!, $completeData: Boolean!, $cityId: Int!, $profileType: ProfileType!, $moduleIds: [ModuleWithDimension], $xpDoowupInHL: Boolean!, $orderProfileType: OrderProfileType!, $priceVersion: Int!, $paymentStage: Int, $projectCreationDate: String, $isElemental: Boolean, $elementalType: String, $orderBookingDate: String) {
  getZoneData(roomType: $roomType, zoneId: $zoneId, subCategoryId: $subCategoryId, categoryId: $categoryId, completeData: $completeData, moduleIds: $moduleIds, profileType: $profileType, cityId: $cityId, xpDoowupInHL: $xpDoowupInHL, orderProfileType: $orderProfileType, priceVersion: $priceVersion, paymentStage: $paymentStage, projectCreationDate: $projectCreationDate, isElemental: $isElemental, elementalType: $elementalType, orderBookingDate: $orderBookingDate) {
    name
    imageUrl
    editable
    zoneId
    categoryId
    counterType
    graphqlModules {
      hingeMotion
      tcMotion
      hasCounterTop
      allowNSWidth
      allowNSDepth
      allowNSHeight
      nsWidthStep
      nsDepthStep
      nsHeightStep
      maxDepth
      maxHeight
      maxWidth
      minDepth
      minHeight
      minWidth
      hasMirror
      hasSkirting
      shutterOnly
      cabinetOnly
      nucleusModuleId
      wardrobeType
      assetModuleId
      applicableSections
      modelId
      moduleImage
      moduleName
      moduleDimension {
        dimensionId
        dimensionName
        width
        depth
        height
        __typename
      }
      partType
      accessoryCapMin
      accessoryCapMax
      cabinetAccesoryCap
      cabinetAccessories {
        minQty
        maxQty
        addOns {
          code
          isEnabled
          name
          price
          __typename
        }
        code
        cutleries {
          code
          isEnabled
          name
          price
          __typename
        }
        isEnabled
        name
        price
        imageUrl
        htcMotion
        htcMake
        __typename
      }
      shuttersWithAccessories {
        shutterId
        jaali
        shutterType
        name
        hasGlass
        hasAluminium
        allowMirror
        handlePositions {
          positionId
          desc
          location
          xOffset
          yOffset
          zOffset
          rotationFromXY
          rotationInXY
          forBase
          forWall
          forTall
          __typename
        }
        accessories {
          minQty
          maxQty
          addOns {
            code
            isEnabled
            name
            price
            imageUrl
            __typename
          }
          code
          cutleries {
            code
            isEnabled
            name
            price
            imageUrl
            __typename
          }
          isEnabled
          name
          price
          imageUrl
          htcMotion
          htcMake
          __typename
        }
        familyNotApplicable
        shutterHeight
        shutterWidth
        widthFormula
        heightFormula
        allowTopExt
        maxTopExt
        allowSideExt
        maxSideExt
        allow2SideExt
        __typename
      }
      graphqlShutters {
        shutterCoreCode
        shutterCoreName
        shutterFinishCode
        shutterFinishName
        shutterCategory
        orderProfileTypes
        __typename
      }
      graphqlCarcasses {
        carcassCode
        carcassName
        __typename
      }
      graphqlGlassPanels {
        isGlass
        epId
        panelGroup
        panelName
        __typename
      }
      graphqlExposedPanels {
        epId
        panelName
        panelType
        meshId
        isSkirting
        useShutterFinish
        hasMirror
        allowExposed
        panelGroup
        __typename
      }
      jaaliTypes {
        shutterCoreCode
        shutterCoreName
        shutterFinishCode
        shutterFinishName
        __typename
      }
      __typename
    }
    visibleSideMaterials {
      shutterCoreCode
      shutterCoreName
      shutterFinishCode
      shutterFinishName
      orderProfileTypes
      __typename
    }
    group25Materials {
      shutterCoreCode
      shutterCoreName
      shutterFinishCode
      shutterFinishName
      orderProfileTypes
      __typename
    }
    groupOSLMaterials {
      shutterCoreCode
      shutterCoreName
      shutterFinishCode
      shutterFinishName
      orderProfileTypes
      __typename
    }
    groupBSLMaterials {
      shutterCoreCode
      shutterCoreName
      shutterFinishCode
      shutterFinishName
      orderProfileTypes
      __typename
    }
    __typename
  }
}
